reviews.title: Perfect Size, Great Quality
reviews.review_text: I recently purchased a 64"x21" full-length mirror from Walmart, and I'm thrilled with my experience. The mirror's size is absolutely perfect for my needs, fitting seamlessly into my space while providing a clear, full-body view. The quality is impressive‚Äîsturdy construction, crisp reflection, and no distortions. Delivery was surprisingly fast, arriving in just a couple of days, and the packaging ensured the mirror arrived without a single scratch or crack. Overall, this was a fantastic purchase, and I'd highly recommend this mirror to anyone looking for a reliable, high-quality option at a great value.

reviews.title: Ya better get ya one!

The delivery person also left it propped up the long way even though the box very clearly says not to lay it upright.

The mirror itself is beautiful. It's a Christmas present for my teenage daughter. The only reason I gave 4 stars is because the package arrived with 3 big gashes in the back of it. Luckily the mirror wasn't damaged or broken, but the back of the mirror could be seen through the holes that were put in the box. I know this is a Walmart issue, because every single package I receive from Walmart is always beat up and looking like people were just throwing the boxes around for fun. A FedEx guy actually called me to see if I wanted the mirror returned to the Walmart facility because of how it looked when it arrived to them and he was afraid it might have been broken. Do better with your packages Walmart!
